Sentencas: A worldwide overview of processing technology of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) components is given and the fabrication techniques of ceramic components are summarized for the different types of SOFCs.
Titulo: Components manufacturing for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Generally, a tendency towards up-scalable and automatizable processes is observed.
Titulo: Components manufacturing for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: In addition, critical points of interconnect materials and interconnect fabrication are stressed.
Titulo: Components manufacturing for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Especially for planar cell designs, the chromium contamination of the cathode and interfacial corrosion is regarded as the weak points to be solved for demonstration of planar SOFC units.
Titulo: Components manufacturing for solid oxide fuel cells
